command.description: Command to manage the LiveMap mod.
command.colormap.description: Generate colormap on client and send to server.
command.fullrender.description: Queue up all generated regions for renderer.
command.radiusrender.description: Queue up generated regions in radius for renderer.
command.reload.description: Reload the mod configuration from disk.
lang.copy-alt: Copy this location to the clipboard
lang.paste-alt: Go to a point from the clipboard
lang.share-alt: Copy a sharable url to the clipboard
lang.center-alt: Center the map on this point
